Text:
You might want to mention that these are not in English. 

Thanks for the upload, even if I can't read them. :)

Dear turtlex, sorry for the confusion. I was not expecting people not knowing Hindi to download Hindi comics collection. I have tried to include "Hindi" in title after reading your feedback, but it seems that it is not possible after uploading. It was my first attempt to upload, I'll be careful hereafter.
